divs: sighting detailssomething told me to look out the window. i did for about 20 min. with my cam zooming in and out the the sky when "bam" this orb\ufo appears out of thin air. it head east and it returned. it was flying back and forth from the spot you originally saw it pop up at. it did this for about an hour, turning into different shapes. it was flying over central park in nyc and from the park into atleast columbus ave. i ran to the park and caught more footage of it zooming back and forth, then it slowly dropped into the park. i have it on film also.. i have over an hour of footage. it was amazing... it was bright red like a red diamond.. check the video.. i posted more up on youtube under "vik456" at youtube.. thanks and enjoy the footage.. again i have about 20 clips of the same craft over central park.. its amazing..
Object Shape: Fireball, Flash, Oval, Sphere, Triangle, Other
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 3 other sightings in New York on or around November 2nd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
